name: The MOBrio
description:
This is parody of the original "Mario Bros." as well as "Lode Runner" (This game is designed for Two Players)

This was built for the PigSquad Summer Slow Jam 2018 #3

The police have stolen and hidden all of the mobs booze around town, the mob has sent out one of their henchmen to retrieve it all, BUT! Can that mobster recover all of the booze before the Police catch them!? You'll have to play to find out.
